item.title: [Exploit development] 2- Understanding Stack Memory
item.author: elsharifabdallah53@gmail.com (Abdallah Mohamed)
item.description: Intro Hello everyone, I hope you are well. In this article, we will discuss the stack, why any computer program needs it, what vital role it plays, and how it works in detail. We will explore the operations performed on the stack and how they are handled. Understanding the stack will pave the way for us in the exploit development field and other fields like reverse engineering and malware development.
